Pipeline.DefaultVisualStyle: Cinematic, high quality, detailed, professional lighting
Pipeline.DefaultCharacterPrompt: A flat 2D animation still of cute anthropomorphic kitten Pipi. Cartoon style, clean bold outlines, solid cel-shaded colors, vector art aesthetic. Pipi has cream and orange fur patches simplified into color blocks, huge expressive green cartoon eyes, big ears, wearing a simple red scarf with stylized yellow star shapes, and a large fluffy striped tail. Standing pose. The background is a simplified graphic galaxy with flat planetary shapes and stars. No photorealism, no 3D textures, no gradients.

DemoProject.Title: 星际小猫的航行
DemoProject.StoryText: 小猫皮皮驾驶着他的罐头飞船，穿过彩虹色的星云。他在月球的背面遇到了一位正在钓星光的机器人，机器人送给他一块发光的能量电池。皮皮充满信心，继续朝着未知的银河系深处飞去。
